meanings.definition: A slang term for a penis.
meanings.sent1: He got hit in the dicks during the game.
meanings.sent2: He felt embarrassed when his pants ripped, revealing his dicks.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about how some people name their pet fish after their own dicks.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a shield, protecting his fragile dicks.
meanings.sent5: The image of the giant inflatable dicks at the parade stuck in his mind.

meanings.definition: A derogatory term for a man.
meanings.sent1: He's such a jerk, always acting like a bunch of dicks.
meanings.sent2: The group of rowdy teenagers were being real dicks at the mall.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy old man muttered about the noisy dicks outside his window.
meanings.sent4: His boss's words cut through him like a sharp dicks.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was portrayed as a cunning and manipulative dicks.

meanings.sent1: The dicks solved the mystery in record time.
meanings.sent2: She admired the dedication of the hardworking dicks in the precinct.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy dicks accidentally tripped over their own feet during the stakeout.
meanings.sent4: The elusive criminal always managed to outsmart even the best dicks.
meanings.sent5: The renowned dicks had a reputation for cracking the toughest cases.
